text: tama deviyangē āyāvan samudīraṇaya kara penvanu læbū viṭa, ēvā pratikṣēpa kara, tama atvalin karana lada væradi (sampūrṇayenma) amataka kara damannāṭa vaḍā aparādhakaruvā kavarekda? ovun kisivak dæna nogannā lesa api ovungē hṛdayanhi tirayakda, ovungē kaṇvalaṭa bihiribhāvayada niyata vaśayenma æti kaḷemu. ebævin (nabiyē!) oba ovunva ṛju mārgayehi (kopamaṇa bægǣpatva) ārādhanā kaḷā vuvada, kisi kalekat ovun ṛju mārgayaṭa ennēma næta
